(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a)
          (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ amazing))
          (NN week))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (DT the) (NN blog)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(week-6, This-1)
cop(week-6, is-2)
det(week-6, a-3)
advmod(amazing-5, most-4)
amod(week-6, amazing-5)
root(ROOT-0, week-6)
prep(week-6, for-7)
det(blog-9, the-8)
pobj(for-7, blog-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (LST (JJ First))
    (S
      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBD was)
        (VP (VBG appearing)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN pilot) (NN episode))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (`` ``)
                  (NP (NNP Food) (NNP Specialist))
                  ('' '')
                  (PP (IN on)
                    (NP (NNP Channel) (NNP U))))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (ADVP (RB now))
      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBN announced)
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (NN ieatishootipost))
                (VP (VBZ has)
                  (VP (VBN been)
                    (VP (VBN awarded)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (JJS Best) (NN Food) (NN Blog))
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP (DT the) (JJ inaugural) (NNP Nuffnang) (NNP Asia) (NNP Pacific) (NNP Blog) (NNS Awards)))))))))))))
    (. !)))


dep(appearing-4, First-1)
nsubj(appearing-4, it-2)
aux(appearing-4, was-3)
root(ROOT-0, appearing-4)
prep(appearing-4, in-5)
det(episode-8, the-6)
nn(episode-8, pilot-7)
pobj(in-5, episode-8)
prep(episode-8, of-9)
nn(Specialist-12, Food-11)
pobj(of-9, Specialist-12)
prep(Specialist-12, on-14)
nn(U-16, Channel-15)
pobj(on-14, U-16)
cc(appearing-4, and-17)
advmod(announced-22, now-18)
nsubjpass(announced-22, it-19)
auxpass(announced-22, is-20)
auxpass(announced-22, been-21)
conj(appearing-4, announced-22)
mark(awarded-27, that-23)
nsubjpass(awarded-27, ieatishootipost-24)
aux(awarded-27, has-25)
auxpass(awarded-27, been-26)
ccomp(announced-22, awarded-27)
det(Blog-31, the-28)
amod(Blog-31, Best-29)
nn(Blog-31, Food-30)
dobj(awarded-27, Blog-31)
prep(Blog-31, in-32)
det(Awards-39, the-33)
amod(Awards-39, inaugural-34)
nn(Awards-39, Nuffnang-35)
nn(Awards-39, Asia-36)
nn(Awards-39, Pacific-37)
nn(Awards-39, Blog-38)
pobj(in-32, Awards-39)
